overview: From 2025-12-07 to 2025-12-08, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 7 active contributors.

topIssues.title: kona-sp1: Ensure expensive operations are offloaded to the host
topIssues.author: Inphi
topIssues.body:
For evm operations, the kona-sp1 program installs a custom implementation of cryptographic operations via revm hooks. The custom implementation is optimized for the sp1 zkVM.
However, there are still a couple areas where the program runs keccak and sha2 outside the evm. We need to ensure that these don't use native riscv implementations, but utilize the sp1 host via its syscall interface.

topPRs.title: Remove redundant path join in update-op-geth helper
topPRs.author: Doryu001
topPRs.body: Drop the unused os import from update-op-geth.py pass the already-correct project value directly to subprocess.run, eliminating the redundant os.path.join call

topPRs.title: fix(devstack/op-reth): fix devstack configuration for op-reth/networks with more than one validator
topPRs.author: theochap
topPRs.body:
## Description

It is impossible to run sysgo with more than an op-reth node at a time. This is a fix that ensures we can:
- deploy networks with more than one op-reth node
- networks can be successfully deployed.

Rationale:
- Disabling discv4 discovery in op-reth is not enough. The former configuration would deploy op-reth with discv5 using the default address/port, which then would fail when trying to deploy more than one node and this node tries to bind to an already allocated port
- `admin_addPeer` does not _also_ connect peers automatically - manually added peers through the admin api will not appear in `admin_peers`. The check below was failing because we expected that peers added through `admin_addPeer` would also appear when calling `admin_peers`.

topPRs.title: op-deployer: Fix error handling in add_game_type CLI parsing. (#18026)
topPRs.author: janjakubnanista
topPRs.body:
Previously it exited with an error message when there was no error.

topContributors.summary: sbvegan: Primarily focused on documentation, merging PR #1907 in ethereum-optimism/docs to fix redirects, which involved modifying 39 files with a net reduction of 126 lines. This work encompassed feature, bugfix, and other tasks, all within the documentation domain.

jsvisa: Focused on documentation improvements, opening two PRs, ethereum-optimism/docs#1906 and ethereum-optimism/docs#1905, to enhance clarity around devnet configurations and JSON-RPC structures, reflecting a primary focus on docs and config work.
ccerv1: Focused on documentation updates, merging a PR in ethereum-optimism/Retro-Funding#90 to update the changelog, which involved modifying 2 files and adding 20 lines of documentation.
janjakubnanista: Focused on addressing an error handling issue within the op-deployer CLI, with an open PR in ethereum-optimism/optimism#18532.
Inphi: Focused on identifying performance bottlenecks within the Optimism ecosystem by creating an issue (ethereum-optimism/optimism#18533) to offload expensive operations to the host.
